title: Himi 189
lyrics:
M.NG.
1.
’E ‘Eiki ‘o e mo’oni
Talu mei mu’a
Pea mo e angalelei,
Ke ke fakama’u.
2.
’Ia kimautolu, ‘Eiki,
‘A e lea, mo e
Fuakava ki he hako
‘O ‘Epalahame.
3.
Ke mau lava ki he ‘ofa,
‘Oku mo’onia,
‘I lalo ni, pea ma’u
‘A e anga ‘o’ou.
4.
Pea mau mo’ui, ‘i he
‘Ao ‘o e ‘Eiki
‘I he mo’ui, ‘o hangē
Ko e kau ‘āngelo.
5.
Tuku kiate au, ‘Eiki,
‘A e tui lahi;
Pea u fa’a fai ‘a e kole,
Pea u fa’a lava’i.
6.
Pea u fa’a puke koe,
Ka ‘e ‘ikai tuku
Kae ‘oua ke’u lava’i
‘Eku fa’a kole. *
